description: Detects PowerShell script execution from Alternate Data Stream (ADS) Author: Sergey Soldatov, Kaspersky Lab, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Run PowerShell Script from ADS
query: (process.parent.executable:*\\powershell.exe AND process.executable:*\\powershell.exe AND process.command_line:*Get\-Content* AND process.command_line:*\-Stream*)
